title: SET_WEATHER_OWNED_BY_NETWORK
content:
0x2703D582// SetWeatherOwnedByNetwork
void SET_WEATHER_OWNED_BY_NETWORK(BOOL network);Parameters:network: true to let the network control weather, false to not use network weather behavior.Sets whether or not the weather should be owned by the network subsystem.To be able to use _SET_WEATHER_TYPE_TRANSITION, this has to be set to false.
